title: Unable to ban
body: I was in the middle of picking a ban during a rank match and the ban button disappeared on me and I was able to see the champs the other team has picked. So I got kicked. Waited and tried again and the ban button was there but it did nothing so I got booted again.

replies.body: This happened to me the first time I used the Alpha. I didn't pick a champ, I thought I did, but I had just filtered some of them with the search box. Maybe this was the case too XD
